rows.label: bf04120100_0010
rows.name: Wadatsumi...

rows.label: bf04120100_0015
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf04120100_0020
rows.name:
I have returned from my assignment,
Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf04120100_0030
rows.name:
Thank you for your hard work.
...Kagutsuchi as well.

rows.label: bf04120100_0040
rows.name: I'm honored.

rows.label: bf04120100_0042
rows.name: It's been a while, Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: bf04120100_0044
rows.name: You look well too, Wadatsumi.

rows.label: bf04120100_0050
rows.name:
So the Heaven's Holy Grail 
was truly the real thing.

rows.label: bf04120100_0060
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: bf04120100_0070
rows.name: What about the boy?

rows.label: bf04120100_0080
rows.name:
From his appearance, 
he seemed to be a salvager.

rows.label: bf04120100_0090
rows.name: I would certainly like to meet him.

rows.label: bf04120100_0100
rows.name: If that is your wish...

rows.label: bf04120100_0105
rows.name:
We just received a report that 
a transport ship bound for the Holy See was attacked.

rows.label: bf04120100_0110
rows.name: A transport ship?

rows.label: bf04120100_0115
rows.name:
Its cargo was Core Crystals, 
according to the report.

rows.label: bf04120100_0120
rows.name: Core Crystals... Could it be Iira?

rows.label: bf04120100_0130
rows.name: Most likely.

rows.label: bf04120100_0140
rows.name:
According to those who managed to escape,
it was a masked man.

rows.label: bf04120100_0150
rows.name: Shin... It must have been him.

rows.label: bf04120100_0160
rows.name: This is the third time.

rows.label: bf04120100_0170
rows.name:
I hear that Invidia's side has also
suffered considerable damage.

rows.label: bf04120100_0180
rows.name: My sincere apologies.

rows.label: bf04120100_0190
rows.name:
This is all my fault, Your Majesty. I let that Iira girl off lightly.
I should have interrogated her more.

rows.label: bf04120100_0200
rows.name:
You set her free because
you thought it was necessary, correct?

rows.label: bf04120100_0210
rows.name: That is enough for me.

rows.label: bf04120100_0220
rows.name:
Besides which, if this really is
the doing of that masked man...

rows.label: bf04120100_0230
rows.name:
I doubt he would have been stopped
even by an army 5,000 strong.

rows.label: bf04120100_0240
rows.name: There is a different problem at hand now.

rows.label: bf04120100_0250
rows.name: ...What do you mean?

rows.label: bf04120100_0260
rows.name:
The Senate has independently
resumed excavation of Judicium.

rows.label: bf04120100_0270
rows.name:
The pro-war faction...
Senator Roderich.

rows.label: bf04120100_0280
rows.name:
Losing the Core Crystals
must have made them anxious.

rows.label: bf04120100_0290
rows.name: Judicium is a very delicate region.

rows.label: bf04120100_0300
rows.name: It would be unwise to provoke Invidia...

rows.label: bf04120100_0310
rows.name: I understand completely.

rows.label: bf04120100_0320
rows.name:
If the Senate make any unsavory
moves, we can take action.

rows.label: bf04120100_0330
rows.name: I'm counting on you, [System:Ruby rt=Nee-san ]Cousin[/System:Ruby]
